creator: Skyship Entertainment Company
descriptionHtml:
Super Simple makes learning fun and simple for pre-schoolers! Used in homes and classrooms all over the world, our educational songs and shows are some of the most trusted and beloved on the internet.

This app features our library of songs and series, as well as exclusive games and storybooks! New content is added weekly. It’s a safe, curated and completely ad-free experience.

WHY SUBSCRIBE?
• Our app is safe and ad-free!
• Our educational content is great for teaching English to native English speakers, and children learning English as a second language.
• We’ve got games! Play games featuring your favorite Super Simple characters.
• We feature only the Super Simple content you know and love. Classic music videos such as Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, Wheels On The Bus, This Is The Way and Baby Shark are all here, along with shows such as Carl's Car Wash, The Bumble Nums and Finny The Shark. And we’re adding new Super Simple content all the time.
• Super Simple is educational! Your little ones will learn about everything from animals, language & gestures, counting, ABCs and more! We make learning fun, and most importantly, simple! And it's great for learning English!
• See our newest content here first! You’ll get access to timed exclusives.
• We’ve created an offline mode that will automatically save your frequently watched videos to your device. You'll always have your favourite videos when you take Super Simple on the road!
• We’ve made the navigation easy for little ones. They’ll have fun exploring the app and finding all their favorite content.

We started as teachers using music and dance in our classroom, and we're proud to be able to continue that tradition with this fun, ad-free app.

Follow us on Instagram: @supersimpleofficial
Follow us on Pinterest: @supersimpleofficial
Follow us on Twitter: @simplesongs

To access all the content in our app you may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase:

• We offer you a 7-day free trial upon selection of the subscription.
• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

Read our terms of service and privacy policy:

appDetails.developerAddress: 302-27 Atlantic Avenue, Toronto, ON Canada M6K3E7

title: Super Simple

container.value: 302-27 Atlantic Avenue, Toronto, ON Canada M6K3E7

creator: Skyship Entertainment Company
descriptionHtml:
Super Simple Songs makes learning fun and simple for pre-schoolers! Used in homes and classrooms all over the world, our educational songs and shows are some of the most trusted and beloved on the internet.

This app features our library of songs and series, as well as exclusive storybooks! New content is added weekly. It’s a safe, curated and completely ad-free experience.

WHY SUBSCRIBE?
• Our app is safe and ad-free!
• Our educational content is great for teaching English to native English speakers, and children learning English as a second language.
• We feature only the Super Simple content you know and love. Classic music videos such as Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, Wheels On The Bus, This Is The Way and Baby Shark are all here, along with shows such as Carl's Car Wash, The Bumble Nums and Finny The Shark. And we’re adding new Super Simple content all the time.
• Super Simple is educational! Your little ones will learn about everything from animals, language & gestures, counting, ABCs and more! We make learning fun, and most importantly, simple! And it's great for learning English!
• See our newest content here first! You’ll get access to timed exclusives.
• We’ve created an offline mode that will automatically save your frequently watched videos to your device. You'll always have your favourite videos when you take Super Simple on the road!
• We’ve made the navigation easy for little ones. They’ll have fun exploring the app and finding all their favorite content.

We started as teachers using music and dance in our classroom, and we're proud to be able to continue that tradition with this fun, ad-free app.

Follow us on Instagram: @supersimpleofficial
Follow us on Pinterest: @supersimpleofficial
Follow us on Twitter: @simplesongs

To access all the content in our app you may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase:

• We offer you a 7-day free trial upon selection of the subscription.
• Your subscription will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Google Play Account Settings after purchase

Read our terms of service and privacy policy:

creator: Skyship Entertainment Company
descriptionHtml:
Make Learning Fun and Super Simple!

Trusted by parents and educators worldwide, our app offers a safe, ad-free environment packed with beloved nursery rhymes, educational content and games for toddlers.

*** Winner of the Creative Child Awards - App Of The Year, Parent Teachers Choice Award, Mom’s Choice Award, Family Choice Award and received The National Parenting Centre’s Seal Of Approval. ***

**All Your Favorites for Preschool**

Whether it’s Noodle & Pals, The Bumble Nums or Caitie’s Classroom, you’ll find all the songs and shows from your favorite YouTube channels and more educational and entertaining content that will help your little ones with early learning.

**Play and Learn**

Count bubbles, run Carl’s Car Wash, play sports, collect food for a picnic and match pictures all in one app. Children have so many options with a growing library of games and interactive storybooks full of their favorite characters from Super Simple.

**Features**

- No ads, ever, just fun.
- Download videos to watch anywhere, anytime, even without internet.
- Early learning about animals, language, gestures, counting, ABCs and more!
- Every week we add new kid-safe educational songs, shows, and games.
- Create your own custom playlists with your favorite nursery rhymes and singalongs.
- Watch all our kids songs from YouTube like Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, Wheels On The Bus, This Is The Way, and Baby Shark!
- All your favorite Super Simple shows like Carl’s Car Wash, The Bumble Nums, Caitie’s Classroom, and Finny The Shark.
- Navigating is easy for little ones. They’ll have fun exploring and finding all their favorite content.
- See our new content here first!Get started today for free and unlock full access to all your favorite content.

**Subscription Details**

To access all the content you may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through the Super Simple App:• We offer you a 7-day free trial upon selection of the subscription.

- Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

**Privacy Policy**

https://supersimple.com/app-terms-of-service-in-app/

https://supersimple.com/app-privacy-policy-in-app/

**About Super Simple**

We started as teachers using music and dance in our classroom, and we’re proud to be able to continue that tradition with this fun, ad-free app. With over 67 billion views, Super Simple is now home to some of the most well known and most loved children’s content on YouTube.

Follow us on Instagram, Pinterest, and TikTok: @supersimpleofficial
descriptionShort: Safe and ad-free! Educational adventures & relaxing lullabies for toddlers!

descriptionHtml:
Make Learning Fun and Super Simple!

Trusted by parents and educators worldwide, our app offers a safe, ad-free environment packed with beloved nursery rhymes, educational content and games for toddlers.

*** Winner of the Creative Child Awards - App Of The Year, Parent Teachers Choice Award, Mom’s Choice Award, Family Choice Award and received The National Parenting Centre’s Seal Of Approval. ***

**All Your Favorites for Preschool**

Whether it’s Noodle & Pals, The Bumble Nums or Caitie’s Classroom, you’ll find all the songs and shows from your favorite YouTube channels and more educational and entertaining content that will help your little ones with early learning.

**Play and Learn**

Count bubbles, run Carl’s Car Wash, play sports, collect food for a picnic and match pictures all in one app. Children have so many options with a growing library of games and interactive storybooks full of their favorite characters from Super Simple.

**Features**

- No ads, ever, just fun.
- Download videos to watch anywhere, anytime, even without internet.
- Early learning about animals, language, gestures, counting, ABCs and more!
- Every week we add new kid-safe educational songs, shows, and games.
- Create your own custom playlists with your favorite nursery rhymes and singalongs.
- Watch all our kids songs from YouTube like Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, Wheels On The Bus, This Is The Way, and Baby Shark!
- All your favorite Super Simple shows like Carl’s Car Wash, The Bumble Nums, Caitie’s Classroom, and Finny The Shark.
- Navigating is easy for little ones. They’ll have fun exploring and finding all their favorite content.
- See our new content here first!Get started today for free and unlock full access to all your favorite content.

**Subscription Details**

To access all the content you may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through the Super Simple App:• We offer you a 7-day free trial upon selection of the subscription.

- Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

**Privacy Policy**

https://supersimple.com/app-terms-of-service-in-app/

https://supersimple.com/app-privacy-policy-in-app/

**About Super Simple**

We started as teachers using music and dance in our classroom, and we’re proud to be able to continue that tradition with this fun, ad-free app. With over 67 billion views, Super Simple is now home to some of the most well known and most loved children’s content on YouTube.

Follow us on Instagram, Pinterest, and TikTok: @supersimpleofficial
descriptionShort: Safe and ad-free! Educational adventures & relaxing lullabies for toddlers!

Whether it’s Noodle & Pals, The Bumble Nums or Caitie’s Classroom, you’ll find all the songs and shows from your favorite YouTube channels and more educational and entertaining content that will help your little ones with early learning.

**Play and Learn**

Count bubbles, run Carl’s Car Wash, play sports, collect food for a picnic and match pictures all in one app. Children have so many options with a growing library of games and interactive storybooks full of their favorite characters from Super Simple.

**Features**

- No ads, ever, just fun.
- Download videos to watch anywhere, anytime, even without internet.
- Early learning about animals, language, gestures, counting, ABCs and more!
- Every week we add new kid-safe educational songs, shows, and games.
- Create your own custom playlists with your favorite nursery rhymes and singalongs.
- Watch all our kids songs from YouTube like Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, Wheels On The Bus, This Is The Way, and Baby Shark!
- All your favorite Super Simple shows like Carl’s Car Wash, The Bumble Nums, Caitie’s Classroom, and Finny The Shark.
- Navigating is easy for little ones. They’ll have fun exploring and finding all their favorite content.
- See our new content here first!Get started today for free and unlock full access to all your favorite content.

**Subscription Details**

To access all the content you may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through the Super Simple App:• We offer you a 7-day free trial upon selection of the subscription.

- Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

**About Super Simple**

We started as teachers using music and dance in our classroom, and we’re proud to be able to continue that tradition with this fun, ad-free app. With over 67 billion views, Super Simple is now home to some of the most well known and most loved children’s content on YouTube.
